item.title: Stop worrying so much about Bernie Sanders
item.description: With the Democratic Presidential primary underway, there have been endless attacks on every candidate. But with Sander’s currently winning, there has been constant scare mongering about his policies and potential divisiveness. However, I believe the hype is overblown by our media. By and large, polling for the cornerstones of Sander’s platform (and to a lesser extent Warren’s) show a majority of Americans favor not only socialist policies, but also upsetting the current power structure.
